description: A command-line tool for product-led growth analysis and implementation.

growth_hubs.detected_intent: Enable viral growth and drive user engagement by suggesting and implementing relevant growth loops within the codebase.
growth_potential: Add a 'growth loop preview' feature that showcases the selected loops to the user in a more visually appealing format before the plan is generated.
Implement a feedback mechanism allowing users to rate the quality and relevance of suggested loops, improving the LLM model's accuracy over time.
Develop a mechanism for the tool to automatically track the implementation of growth loops and measure their effectiveness, providing data-driven insights into growth initiatives.

growth_hubs.detected_intent: Drives user engagement by providing a structured way to set and track product-led growth goals.
growth_potential: Implement a system for users to track the progress of their growth objectives directly within the tool, creating a feedback loop and enhancing user engagement.
Add integrations with popular analytics platforms to automatically update objective metrics, reducing manual effort and providing real-time performance insights.
Develop a feature that recommends specific actions or experiments to help users achieve their growth objectives based on the identified GTM gaps.

growth_hubs.detected_intent: Enables data-driven decisions by allowing the periodic (ideally daily) collection of key metrics
growth_potential: Add automated scheduling of daily log fetching using system task schedulers to minimize user intervention.
Develop a dashboard to visualize trends in daily log data and provide automated insights and anomaly detection.
Implement alerting mechanisms to notify users when key metrics deviate significantly from defined targets or healthy benchmarks.

growth_hubs.detected_intent: Facilitates user onboarding by providing a structured framework for understanding product-led growth principles.
growth_potential: Create a library of pre-built growth templates tailored to different business models and industries to accelerate user onboarding.
Develop a visual editor for users to customize their growth templates, allowing them to add, remove, and modify lifecycle stages, milestones, and metrics.
Implement a feature that recommends relevant growth loops based on the selected growth template, providing a guided path for implementation.

gtm_gaps.description: A guided tutorial for new users to understand the tool's functionality and how to get started.
Track user behavior within the CLI tool (command usage, frequency, errors) to identify areas for improvement and optimization.
A platform for users to ask questions, share knowledge, and provide feedback on the tool. This enhances user engagement and builds a community around the tool.
Allow users to easily share growth plans or objectives with their team members or colleagues to facilitate collaboration and knowledge sharing.
